title: Samsung Bulls Bet Record Earnings Can Sustain $350 Billion Rally
description: A stock rally that has added $350 billion in market value for Samsung Electronics Co. since the start of last year may have more room to run as bullish analysts and investors eye record profits.
content: A stock rally that has added $350 billion in market value for Samsung Electronics Co. since the start of last year may have more room to run as bullish analysts and investors eye record profits.
